headline: PPG strengthens powder coatings presence in Italy through partnership with SARO/Siccardi
summary: PITTSBURGH, November 18, 2024--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced a strategic partnership with SARO/Siccardi, the largest distributor of powder coatings in Italy. The collaboration will strengthen PPG’s distribution network for powder coatings in the Italian market and broaden customer access to high-quality products and services.

headline: PPG inducts five new members into Collegium association, recognizing technology innovations aligned to growth
